properties.name: Palace of Parliament
properties.txt: The Palace of the Parliament (Romanian: Palatul Parlamentului) is the seat of the Parliament of Romania. It is located on Dealul Arsenalului in the national capital city of central Bucharest (Sector 5).

properties.name: Old Town
properties.attr: By Giuseppe Milo from Dublin, Ireland - Sunset in the Old Town - Bucharest, Romania - Travel photography, CC BY 2.0, https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=62639335
properties.txt: The Old Town is located in the center of Bucharest, Romania and is popular throughout the world for its nightlife.

properties.name: Revolution Square
properties.attr: De la Mister No, CC BY 3.0, https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=54638602
properties.txt: Revolution Square (Romanian: Piața Revoluției) is a square in central Bucharest, on Calea Victoriei. Known as Piața Palatului (Palace Square) until 1989, it was later renamed after the Romanian Revolution of December 1989.

properties.name: National Museum of Romanian History
properties.txt: The National Museum of Romanian History (Romanian: Muzeul Național de Istorie a României) is a museum located on Calea Victoriei in Bucharest, Romania, which contains Romanian historical artifacts from prehistoric times up to modern times.

properties.name: Romanian Athenaeum
properties.attr: By Mihai Petre - Own work, CC BY-SA 3.0 ro, https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=16572272
properties.txt: The Romanian Athenaeum (Romanian: Ateneul Român) is a concert hall in the center of Bucharest, Romania and a landmark of the Romanian capital city.
